seo.title: Garmin Forerunner® 45 | Running Watches
seo.ogDescription: Forerunner® 45 running watches come in a variety of colors and; include wrist-based heart rate monitoring and incident detection for select activities.

overviewTab.title: Overview

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
What You'll Love
Battery life (smartwatch mode)Up to 7 days
Watch display typeSunlight-visible, transflective memory-in-pixel (MIP)
Water rating 5 ATM

General
Strap material

silicone

Lens Material

chemically strengthened glass

Physical size

42 x 42 x 11.4 mm

Fits wrists with a circumference of 129-197 mm

Weight

Small: 32 g
Large: 36 g

Display Size1.04" (26.3 mm) diameter
Display Resolution208 x 208 pixels
Colour display
Battery lifeSmartwatch Mode: Up to 7 days
GPS mode: Up to 13 hours
Charging methodGarmin proprietary plug charger
Memory/History80 hours of activity data

Clock Features
Time/date
GPS Time Sync
Automatic daylight saving time
Alarm clock
Timer
Stopwatch

Health & Wellness Monitoring
Wrist-based heart rate (constant, every second)
Daily resting heart rate
Abnormal heart rate alertsYes (high and low)
FITNESS AGE Yes (in app)
BODY BATTERY™ ENERGY MONITOR
All-day stress
Relaxation Breathing Timer
SLEEP Yes (Advanced)

Sensors
GPS
GLONASS
Galileo
Garmin Elevate™ wrist heart rate monitor
Accelerometer

Daily Smart Features
Connectivity
Connect IQ™ (downloadable watch faces, data fields, widgets and apps)yes (watch faces only)
Smart Notifications
Calendar
Weather forecasts
Controls smartphone music
Find My Phone
Find My Watch
Pairs with Garmin Connect™ Mobile
Smartphone compatibilityiPhone®, Android™

Activity profiles
GymStrength, Cardio and Elliptical Training, Stair Stepping
WELLNESSYoga
INDOOR RUNNINGTreadmill Running, Indoor Track Running
OUTDOOR RUNNINGRunning
CyclingBiking, Indoor Biking

Safety and Tracking Features
Incident Detection during select activitiesyes (smartphone required)
Assistanceyes (smartphone required)
LiveTrack
Live Event SharingAndroid™ Only

Activity Tracking Features
Step counter
Move alerts (displays on device after a period of inactivity; walk for a couple of minutes to reset it)
Auto goal (learns your activity level and assigns a daily step goal)
Calories Burned
Distance traveled
Intensity minutes
TrueUp™
Move IQ™

Training, Planning and Analysis Features
Customisable screen(s)
Downloadable training plans
HR zones
HR alerts
HR calories
HR broadcast (broadcasts HR data over ANT+™ to paired devices)
GPS speed and distance
Customizable activity profiles
Auto Pause®
Interval training
Advanced workouts
Auto Lap®
Manual lap
VO2 Max (Run)
Audio prompts
Touch and/or button lock
Activity history on watch
Physio TrueUp

Running Features
GPS-based distance, time and pace
Cadence (provides real-time number of steps per minute)
Run workouts
Foot pod capable

Cycling Features
Alerts (triggers alarm when you reach goals including time, distance, heart rate or calories)
Speed and cadence sensor support (w/sensor)
